document_data.caption: Blackmul Street on a circa. [[1492 DR]] map of the Trades Ward of Waterdeep
document_data.name: Blackmul Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Blackmul Street''' was a hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]] paved alleyway in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: This alley ran in a straight line from north to south, running north off of [[Telshambra's Street]] and terminating on [[Shoor Street]]. It was situated along blocks of buildings between [[Beacon Street]] and the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]].
document_data.Notable Inhabitants: Quite a number of retired [[adventurer]]s lived in the block of buildings between Beacon Street and Blackmul Street.<ref>
